descriptionHtml:
At first: Sorry for my REALLY Bad English!

Uthgerd is my Follower of Choice, since my first hour in Skyrim, and of course i tried to find a good Overhaul for her. So i found This Mod >>[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6425/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D6425%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Younger Uthgerd the Unbroken[/url]<< wich just removes her wrinkles. When I Played with her, i Realised that these wrinkles are the only Thing that makes her look like an warrior marked by many Battles. And now i've tried to Make a total new Face for her wich let her look like a Battle proofed Warrior (of course that's just my Opinion).

Credits:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4554/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D4554&pUp=1]Skyrim NPC Editor[/url] by [b]foretrenty[/b]

When You want to to edit this face, Just ask and Link! BUT ONLY ON NEXUS
author: LuckyTrixx
